AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: individual being questioned by Agent Pena, driver of the tractor-trailer, gave consent for the search, charged with conspiracy to transport aliens within the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon: individual being questioned by Agent Pena, passenger in the tractor-trailer, attempted to pull down the fold-up bed, charged with conspiracy to transport aliens within the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz: undocumented alien testifying at trial, identified McMillon as the person motioning for them to hide, arranged to pay thousands of dollars to be smuggled into the United States, entered the United States unlawfully
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Miguel Hernandez-Gomez: undocumented alien testifying at trial, identified McMillon as the person motioning for them to hide, arranged to pay thousands of dollars to be smuggled into the United States, entered the United States unlawfully
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Luis Pena and Manuel Hernandez: agents who conducted the checkpoint stop and search of the tractor-trailer, testified about the events during the suppression hearing
